ygData.subject: RE: Guild Matters
ygData.msgSnippet: From:           	LKW  Subject:        	RE: [sg-everquest] Guild Matters ... Training STR very sianz, basically keep forcing open doors
ygData.messageBody:
From: LKW <leekw13@...>
Subject: RE: [sg-everquest] Guild Matters

> train with to increase STR. CGW say find something to hit, I try those
> sparring bags in Kingpin club but cannot use them. Can teach? ;)

Training STR very sianz, basically keep forcing open doors and
chests. Don't use crowbar, that's too easy.

Any locked door you see, whack until no energy left, rest awhile (in
the strategic map screen) then whack again. Don't care about the
"I can't do it" message. Usually, can whack until about 30 to 40
times or more before increase one point... that's why damn sianz.

Any door or chest can be opened with patience, that's why I prefer
to use my mechanical skills for repairing stuff. There's this guy,
VERY cheap one, from M.E.R.C, called Gasket. His mechanical is
pretty high, comabt skills like crap, but only 200 a day. I use him
as a base repairman. I just sit him down in my base of operations,
and get him to repair stuff that my comabt mercs have broken or
worn out... *heh*


--


Love is in the air...
Get me a gas mask, quick!!!

Cya,
Praetor

Praetor@...
ICQ 1767778
